name: Die Already!
description:
There is a downloadable windows version down below that looks a bit better and runs better than the web version.

This enemy just won't die! And every time it dies it comes back stronger! See if you can outlast the enemy while it continually rolls to become stronger. This game was created for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 in 48 hours.

How to Play

Dodge bullets and kill the initial enemy over and over until it finally dies for good. The enemy will roll for a new permanent buff every time you kill it. When you run out of energy you will roll for a random new weapon. You can also dodge bullets by dashing (you are invulnerable while dashing). The enemy will also spawn some additional enemies that do not get temporary buffs when they die. These additional enemies are not required kills.

Controls
  • WASD/Arrow keys to move
  • Left click to shoot
  • Shift/Right click to dash
Attributions

Sound

  • Many sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
  • Some additional sound effects that I need to dig up the attributions for when I'm more awake
  • Music by Alexadr Zhelanov

Art

  • Particle effects from https://www.kenney.nl/
  • Beam icon by Lorc
